alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 02 at 7:59AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Colorado, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Sherman, Wallace, Logan, Gove, Greeley and Wichita Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to temperatures around freezing, freezing fog is possible especially on bridges and overpasses causing slick conditions. Areas of freezing rain from overnight will create hazardous driving conditions. Be extra careful if traveling.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
